name: Wild Animal Puzzle Free
description:
Do you like animals? The Wild animal puzzle gives you a nice selection of beautiful wild animals which you can turn into nice jigsaw puzzles. Pick a picture from the gallery, choose your difficulty level and enjoy the puzzle.
If you can't find your picture in our selection, pick one from your device or take a picture with your camera and turn it into a puzzle.
As soon as you are done with solving the pieces you can share your result with your friends or challenge someone else to solve it faster. You can also set the picture as a wallpaper to have it on your display and enjoy the cute animal on your device.
Kids mode disables the rotation of the pieces and limits the difficulty levels thus turning the puzzle into a simpler and more convenient puzzle game for young players.

Our gallery contains the following categories:
• Birds – swan, pelican, eagle, hornbill, hawk, flamingo, penguin, ostrich, owl, peacock, pigeon, etc
• Mammals – marmot, elephant, zebra, rhino, hippopotamus, fox, deer, bear, buffalo, capybara, antelope, capricorn, coyote, goat, giraffe, tapir, tiger, sun bear, wild boar, jaguar, wolf, panda, Patagonian mara, kangaroo, etc
• Monkeys – chimpanzee, baboon, imperial tamarin, lemur, mandrill, gorilla, orangutan, marmoset, etc
• Reptiles – spider, amphibia, alligator, crocodile, frog, iguana, snapper and turtle
• Rodents – squirrel, hare, nutria, otter and rabbit

The features of our puzzle:
• It is not required to have internet access to play the puzzle game (works in offline mode)
• Many nice high definition pictures sorted in a cute gallery
• Lots of difficulty levels
• Smooth game-play. (Uses the hardware acceleration of the device.)
• Game timer.
• Share result/picture.
• Multitouch zoom and piece rotation
• Zoom In / Out.
• Piece rotation.
• Save game.
• Best score statistics.
• Set picture as wallpaper.
• Nice background nature music.
• Magical sound effects.
• Vibration when pieces merge.
• Kids mode
• Wild animal puzzle is free.
